# milligramsPerDeciliter

**Type Property**

The milligrams per deciliter unit of concentration.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var milligramsPerDeciliter: UnitConcentrationMass { get }
```

## Accessing Predefined Units

- **gramsPerLiter**: The grams per liter unit of concentration.
- **millimolesPerLiter(withGramsPerMole:)**: Returns the millimoles per liter unit with the specified number of grams per mole.
